sentence.Network_en: My grandpa is so old that he is often heavy - footed.
sentence.Network_cn: 我祖父年龄太大了,说起话来总是颠三倒四.

sentence.Network_en: Martha is not fat, but she is heavy - footed and walks noisily.
sentence.Network_cn: 玛莎并不胖, 但她行动迟缓而笨拙,脚步声很重.

sentence.Network_en: Peter was fined because he was too heavy - footed.
sentence.Network_cn: 彼得被罚款了,因为他好开快车.
